channel.title: Is windows vista theme hard to setup?
channel.description: I saw all the stuff about the risk of it messing up your system files and ruening your computer.. is it hard to set up?

item.title: Is windows vista theme hard to setup?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“rs2crash, post:1, topic:91201”]vista is trash im surprised people use it instead of XP it makes 5 minutes to boot up for me and XP takes less than 7 seconds worthless shit every game I play such as america’s army runs at 10 FPS or less some programs don’t even work such as DLL injecters

Did you know changing your font size for display requires a PC reboot only in vista!

My first look at task manger was wow Vista is sweet only around 4-5 vista components running but when I fired up my ProcessViewer32 figured out all the svchost which windows XP has are just hidden from task manager no change…

looks like it been coded in flash just without the Low Quaility button.

edit
It’s a good operating system for a noob/averge noob gamer fast pc.[/quote]
Take away gamer, and it’s me

Read full topic
